translatorsignup-summary: Uise this page tae indicate whit leids ye can owerset in, n hou ye want tae be contacted aneat new owersetin requests.
translationnotifications-desc: Permits owerseters tae sign up fer owersetin notifications
translationnotifications-email-confirmed: Yer wab-mail address haes been confirmed
translationnotifications-email-disablema: Yer wabmail address haes been confirmed, but in [[Special:Preferences|yer preferences]] ye'v asked tae receeve naw wabmail.
translationnotifications-email-unconfirm: Yer wab-mail address haesna been confirmed. $1
translationnotifications-email-notset: Ye'v na gien ae wab-mail address. Ye can dae that in yer [[Special:Preferences|preeferances]].
translationnotifications-freq-always: Whan thaur is sommit new tae owerset
translationnotifications-signup-success: Yer owersetin notification preeferences were hained.
translationnotifications-submit-ok: Annooncments hae been added til ae line n ar delivert bi ae backgroon joab.
translationnotifications-deadline-label: Deidline tae indicate in this annooncment:
translationnotifications-languages-to-no: Comma-separated leid codes; lea blank tae tell fer aw leids.
translationnotifications-error-no-transl: Thaur ar naw owersetable pages in this wiki.
translationnotifications-email-body:
Hallo $1,

Ye'r gettin this e-mail acause ye {{GENDER:$10|signed up}} as ae owersetter {{PLURAL:$9|fur}} $2 on {{SITENAME}}.

There is ae page tae owerset there: $3.
Ye can owerset it bi sneckin on the airtin ablo:
$4

$5
$6

$7

Yer help is heichly appreciatit. Owersetters sicklik ye help {{SITENAME}} tae wirk
as a truly multilingual commonity.

Thank ye!
Fae the {{SITENAME}} owersettin coordinators

----

Ye'r gettin this wab-mail acause ye signed up tae get e-mails relatit tae owersettins on {{SITENAME}}. Tae unsubscrieve or tae chynge yer notification preferences fur owersettins, please veesit $8.
translationnotifications-talkpage-body:
Hello $2,

Ye'r gettin this notification acause ye {{GENDER:$1|signed up}} as ae owersetter {{PLURAL:$9|fur}} $3 on {{SITENAME}}.
The page [[$4]] is available fur owersettin. Ye can owerset it here:
$5

$6
$7

$8

Yer help is heichly appreciated. Owersetters siclike yersel help {{SITENAME}} tae wark
as ae truily multilingual commonity.

Thank ye!

{{SITENAME}} owersettin coordinators
translationnotifications-digestemail-sub: Rindoon wab-mail fer owersetin requests fae {{SITENAME}}
translationnotifications-digestemail-bod:
Hallo $1,

Ye'r gettin this wab-mail cause ye {{GENDER:$1|signed up}} aes aen owerseter fer $2 oan {{SITENAME}}.

Thaur {{PLURAL:$3|is 1 page|ar $3 pages}} available fer owersetin. The details ar gien ablo.

$4

Yer heelp is grechtlie appreciated. Owerseters like ye heelp {{SITENAME}} tae wark
aes ae trulie multilingual communitie.

Thank ye!
Fae the {{SITENAME}} owersetin admeenistraters

----

Ye'r gettin this wab-mail cause ye signed up tae get wab-mails relatit til owersetins oan {{SITENAME}}. Tae onsubscreebe or tae chynge yer notifeecation preeferences fer owersetins, please veesit <$5>.
translationnotifications-digestemail-not: Oan $1, $2 maurkt "$3" fer owersetin. Ye can owerset it at $4
translationnotifications-email-priority: The prioritie o this page is $1.
translationnotifications-email-deadline: The deidline fer owersetin this page is $1.
logentry-notifytranslators-sent: $1 {{GENDER:$2|sent}} aen annooncement aneat owersetin page $3; {{PLURAL:$10|leid|leids}}: $4; deidline: $5; prioritie: $6; sent til {{PLURAL:$7|yin receepient|$7 receepients}}, failed fer {{PLURAL:$8|yin receepient|$8 receepients}}, skipt fer {{PLURAL:$9|yin receepient|$9 receepients}}
log-description-notifytranslators: Ae log o annooncements sent til owersetters anent owersettable pages
translationnotifications-signup-legal: Ye agree that bi providin this information we can contact ye anent topics relati til {{SITENAME}} that we think micht be o interest til ye. Ye agree that yer data is owerganged bi oor [[{{MediaWiki:Privacypage}}|privacy policy]].
